name: ListZoomWebinars
description:
Retrieve all scheduled webinars for a Zoom user.

This tool lists all the webinars scheduled by or on behalf of a webinar host in Zoom. It's useful for users or apps with webinar plans that need to manage or review upcoming webinars. The tool returns only unexpired webinars and requires a Pro or higher plan with the webinar add-on.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: The user's ID or email address. For user-level apps, use 'me' to refer to the authenticated user.

value_schema.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

parameters.name: webinar_type
parameters.description: Specify the type of webinars to list. Choose 'scheduled' for unexpired, live, and upcoming scheduled webinars, or 'upcoming' for all upcoming webinars, including live ones.

value_schema.description:
The type of webinar. 
* `scheduled` - All valid previous (unexpired) webinars, live webinars, and upcoming scheduled webinars. 
* `upcoming` - All upcoming webinars, including live webinars.

parameters.name: webinar_list_page_size
parameters.description: The number of webinar records to return in a single API call for the Zoom user. Adjust for pagination needs.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use this token for pagination instead of the deprecated page_number field.

value_schema.description: **Deprecated** We will no longer support this field in a future release. Instead, use the `next_page_token` for pagination.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: page_number
parameters.description: **Deprecated** We will no longer support this field in a future release. Instead, use the `next_page_token` for pagination.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.

value_schema.description: The user's user ID or email address. For user-level apps, pass the `me` value.
